charts.description: This metric has a 10 minute delay for cluster collection.

sources.name: nodes
sources.query: lag(10m, count(align(60s, mean, mcount(5m, ts("kubernetes.node.cpu.usage" and cluster="${cluster_name}")))))

charts.description: This metric has a 10 minute delay for cluster collection.
This metric has a 10 minute delay for cluster collection.
This metric has a 10 minute delay for cluster collection.

charts.description: Click On The Bar To Drill Down.

charts.name: Pod Memory Usage Avg

sources.name: pod_avg_mem
sources.query: avg(ts("kubernetes.cluster.memory.usage", cluster="${cluster_name}"), cluster) / sum(ts("kubernetes.cluster.pod.count", cluster="${cluster_name}"), cluster)

charts.description: Click On The Bar To Drill Down.

charts.name: Container Memory Usage Avg
charts.description: Click On The Bar To Drill Down.

sources.name: pod_failed
sources.query: count(align(60s, count(ts("kubernetes.pod.status.phase", cluster="${cluster_name}" and phase="Failed"), pod_name)))

charts.description: This metric has a 10 minute delay for cluster collection.

sources.name: cont_terminated
sources.query: count(align(60s, mean, count(highpass(0, ts("kubernetes.pod_container.status", cluster="${cluster_name}" and status="terminated")), pod_name, container_name)))

charts.description: This metric has a 10 minute delay for cluster collection.
This metric has a 10 minute delay for cluster collection.

sources.name: pod_running
sources.query: count(align(60s, count(ts("kubernetes.pod.status.phase", cluster="${cluster_name}" and phase="Running"), pod_name)))

charts.description: This metric has a 10 minute delay for cluster collection.

sources.name: cont_running
sources.query: lag(10m, count(align(60s, mean, count(ts("kubernetes.pod_container.status", cluster="${cluster_name}" and status="running"), pod_name, container_name))))

charts.description: This metric has a 10 minute delay for cluster collection.
This metric has a 10 minute delay for cluster collection.

sources.name: pod_pending
sources.query: count(align(60s, count(ts("kubernetes.pod.status.phase", cluster="${cluster_name}" and phase="Pending"), pod_name)))

charts.description: This metric has a 10 minute delay for cluster collection.

sources.name: cont_waiting
sources.query: count(align(60s, mean, count(ts("kubernetes.pod_container.status", cluster="${cluster_name}" and status="waiting"), pod_name, container_name)))

charts.description: This metric has a 10 minute delay for cluster collection.

sources.name: deployment_count
sources.query: lag(10m, count(align(60s, count(ts("kubernetes.deployment.ready_replicas", cluster="${cluster_name}"), cluster, namespace_name, deployment))))

charts.description: This metric has a 10 minute delay for cluster collection.

sources.name: pod_succeeded
sources.query: count(align(60s, count(ts("kubernetes.pod.status.phase", cluster="${cluster_name}" and phase="Succeeded"), pod_name)))

charts.description: This metric has a 10 minute delay for cluster collection.

sources.name: container_restarts
sources.query: lag(10m, sum(align(60s, mean, msum(60s, ts("kubernetes.pod_container.restart_count" and cluster="${cluster_name}")))))

charts.description: This metric has a 10 minute delay for cluster collection.
